### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title (English)

Annual External Audit Services

#### Title (French)

Services d’audit externe annuels

#### Reference Number

cb-96-59165068

#### Solicitation Number

002960

#### Publication Date

18 November 2024

#### Tender Closing Date

13 December 2024, 2:00 PM EST

#### Expected Contract Start Date

2 June 2026

#### Expected Contract End Date

2 June 2031

#### Tender Status

[Open]  ( Available for tender submission )

#### Procurement Category

SRV  ( Service )

#### Notice Type

Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Method

Competitive - Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria

Selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Contracting Entity

Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC)

#### Contracting Entity Address

700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0P7, Canada

#### Tender Description (English)

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is to identify a preferred service provider for External Audit Services. The selected provider will be engaged on a non-exclusive basis for a maximum term of 9 years, initially for 5 years with 2 subsequent 2-year term extensions.

#### Tender Description (French)

Cette demande de propositions est afin de désigner un fournisseur privilégié de services d’audit externe. Le fournisseur retenu sera engagé à titre non exclusif pour un maximum de 9 ans, initialement pour une période de 5 ans, avec 2 extensions de durée subséquents de 2 ans chacune.

Email: rlemay@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
Phone: ( 604 ) 737-4019
